Package org.garret.perst.fulltext

Class FullTextQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.garret.perst.fulltext.FullTextQuery
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FullTextQueryBinaryOp, FullTextQueryMatchOp, FullTextQueryUnaryOp

    public class FullTextQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for full test search query nodes. Query can be parsed by FullTextSearchHelper class or explicitly created by user.

        public boolean isConstrained()
